hero.subtitle: Your Brand. Our Digital Brilliance.
hero.description: We elevate brands with standout websites, magnetic social media, powerful content strategies, and unforgettable identities. Partner with us to grow, engage, and lead.

social_proof.heading: Trusted by Forward-Thinking Businesses
social_proof.description: Join the elite circle of brands we've elevated with 3D web experiences

testimonialsList.quote: Folada's SMM team grew our Instagram from 1k to 10k in just 3 months. Their content is creative, on-brand, and drives real engagement.
testimonialsList.author: Simon Adams

testimonialsList.quote: Our new brand identity is stunning. The logo, colors, and messaging finally reflect who we are. We get compliments from clients every week!
testimonialsList.author: Irakli Kapanadze

testimonialsList.quote: The content strategy Folada developed for us doubled our blog traffic and brought in high-quality leads. Their team is proactive and data-driven.
testimonialsList.author: Nick Taylor

testimonialsList.quote: Folada enhanced the authenticity of our business with a beautiful and modern website, and they completed the job in just 5 days! I highly recommend them.
testimonialsList.author: Mariam Magradze

testimonialsList.quote: We fully handed over Folada. We had a lot of doubts at first, but we found out that their services are really professional.
testimonialsList.author: Saba Foladashvili

cta.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Brand?
cta.description: From SMM and brand identity to content strategy and stunning websites, we help you grow, engage, and stand out. Let’s build your digital success story together.

footer.description: We boost your online presence, help you find more customers, and support your business growth every step of the way.

about.title: About Folada
about.paragraph: At Folada, we don’t just build digital products — we build your empire. From revolutionary web and mobile solutions to magnetic branding, compelling content, and unstoppable growth strategies, we fuel businesses that refuse to settle for second place. Partner with us to unleash your brand’s full potential and lead your industry with confidence, innovation, and precision.

visionary.title: Visionary Strategy
visionary.desc: We craft bold, future-focused plans that position your brand to disrupt markets and capture loyal customers.

endtoend.title: End-to-End Excellence
endtoend.desc: From flawless code and captivating design to persuasive copywriting and targeted marketing — every detail is executed flawlessly to drive measurable success.

growthAcceleration.title: Growth Acceleration
growthAcceleration.desc: Our data-driven SEO, viral social media campaigns, and strategic content ignite explosive growth and maximize your ROI.

userObsession.title: User Obsession
userObsession.desc: We design experiences that don’t just engage users — they inspire loyalty and transform customers into lifelong advocates.

partnership.title: True Partnership
partnership.desc: Beyond launch, we provide relentless support, optimization, and innovation so your business scales continuously without limits.

servicesSection.heading: What Do We Do?
servicesSection.subtitle: Precision‑engineered solutions that elevate your digital presence

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Transform your vision into a blazing-fast, SEO-optimized website or app that captivates visitors and drives real results. Experience flawless performance and stunning design—built for your success.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: Put your brand in every pocket! We craft sleek, high-performance mobile apps that wow users and keep them coming back—on any device, anywhere.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Make every click unforgettable. Our pixel-perfect designs blend beauty with intuitive usability, turning visitors into loyal fans.

services.title: SEO & Analytics
services.description: Rise to the top of search results and stay there! Our data-driven SEO and real-time analytics put you ahead of the competition—so you can grow with confidence.

services.title: Social Media Marketing (SMM)
services.description: Ignite your brand on every platform! We create scroll-stopping campaigns and viral content that boost engagement, followers, and sales.

services.title: Copywriting
services.description: Turn words into revenue. Our persuasive copy grabs attention, inspires action, and perfectly matches your brand’s unique voice.

services.title: Brand Identity
services.description: Stand out with a memorable brand! We design logos, color palettes, and visual systems that capture your essence and make a lasting impression.

services.title: Content Strategy
services.description: Fuel your growth with a winning content plan. We craft strategies that attract, engage, and convert your ideal audience.

services.title: Maintenance & Support
services.description: Keep your digital assets running smoothly. We offer ongoing updates, security, and support—so you can focus on your business.
